Documentation: https://open-cmsis-pack.github.io/cmsis-toolbox/YML-Input-Format/#telnet-for-pyocd
TelnetOptionsType.description: Telnet port for connecting remote tools.

pname.description: Processor name of the processor (only required for multi-core systems).

port.description: Set TCP/IP port number of Telnet Server.

file.description: Base path and name of the telnet output file (without extension).

GdbServersType.title:
gdbserver:
Documentation: https://open-cmsis-pack.github.io/cmsis-toolbox/YML-CBuild-Format/#gdbserver
GdbServersType.description: Information for GDB server option of debugger.

pname.description: Processor name of the processor (only required for multi-core systems).

punit.description: Identifies the procssor core in a SMP system.

vars.description: Initial values for debug variables used in debug sequences.

DebugPortsType.description: Describes the CoreSight debug ports of the device and its capabilities.

dpid.description: Unique ID of this debug port.

tapindex.description: TAP index in the JTAG scan chain of this device from TDI to TDO (default 0).

AccessPortsType.description: List of CoreSight access ports (APv1/APv2) (mandatory for multi-processor devices).

apid.description: Unique ID of this access port.

index.description: The index to select this access port (APv1) for a target access.

address.description: The address to select this access port (APv2) in its parent's address space for a target access.

HPROT.description: Value for HPROT (AHB Protection Control) bits.

SPROT.description: Value for SPROT (Secure Protection Control) bit.

DatapatchesType.description: List of patch values a debugger shall apply when reading from the device.

address.description: Address for which to apply the patch.

value.description: Value to overwrite from device (for example in a ROM table).

mask.description: The bits to patch. Default: complete value is replaced.

type.description: Type of data access to patch. Default is Mem.

DebugProcessorsType.description: Map of pname identifiers to access port IDs (mandatory for multi-processor devices).

apid.description: Access port ID to use for this processor.

reset-sequence.description: Name of debug sequence for reset operation

DebugPunitsType.description: Specifies processor units in a symmetric multi-processor core (MPCore).

punit.description: Specifies a specific processor unit of a symmetric MPCore.

address.description: Specifies the base address of the CPU debug block.

DebugTopologyType.title:
debug-topology:
Documentation: https://open-cmsis-pack.github.io/cmsis-toolbox/YML-CBuild-Format/#debug-topology
DebugTopologyType.description: Properties of the system hardware for debug functionality.

swj.description: Device allows switching between Serial Wire Debug (SWD) and JTAG protocols (true or false).

dormant.description: Device requires the dormant state to switch debug protocols (true or false).

sdf.description: System Description File (*.sdf) specified in the DFP.

generated-by.description: Tool name that generated this file.

target-type.description: Name of the target-type that was selected.

target-set.description: Name of the target-set that was selected.

compiler.description: Compiler toolchain used for code generation.

TargetSetsType.title:
target-set:
Documentation: https://open-cmsis-pack.github.io/cmsis-toolbox/YML-Input-Format/#target-set
TargetSetsType.description: One or more target-set configurations for projects, images, and debugger.

set.description: Start of a configuration, optional with name. The default set is unnamed.

TargetSetImagesType.title:
images:
Documentation: https://open-cmsis-pack.github.io/cmsis-toolbox/YML-Input-Format/#images
TargetSetImagesType.description: List of images that belong to this set.

info.description: Brief description of the image file.

load-offset.description: Offset applied to the binary content when loading the image file.

start-pname.description: Debugger connects at start to this processor.

TargetSetLoadType.title:
load:
Documentation: https://open-cmsis-pack.github.io/cmsis-toolbox/YML-Input-Format/#load
TargetSetLoadType.description: Specifies the load mode for the project output or image file.

WestProjectType.title:
west:
Documentation: https://open-cmsis-pack.github.io/cmsis-toolbox/YML-Input-Format/#west
WestProjectType.description: Enable West build orchestration wrapper for Zephyr projects.

app-path.description: Path to the application source directory.

project-id.description: Project identifier (default: last sub-dir name of app-path).

board.description: Board name used for west build invocation (default: variable $west-board$).

west-opt.description: Options for the west tool (default: empty).
